landing.title: Thola Iqembu Lakho Lezepolitiki
landing.subtitle: Phendula imibuzo mayelana nemibono yakho yezepolitiki uthole ukuthi yiliphi iqembu laseNingizimu Afrika elihambisana nezindinganiso zakho.
landing.privacy: Izimpendulo zakho zigcinwa endaweni futhi azikaze zabiwe.

howItHelps.title: Indlela Leli Thuluzi Elisizayo
howItHelps.intro: Yenza ivoti lakho libalwe ngokuqonda lapho umi khona ngempela. Qhathanisa imibono yakho nezikhundla zamaqembu wonke angempela.

benefit1.title: Nquma Phakathi Komsindo
benefit1.text: Yeqa izithembiso zemikhankaso ubone amaqembu ahambisana nezinkolelo zakho ezindabeni zenqubomgomo yangempela.

benefit2.title: Thola Ukufanana Okungalindelekile
benefit2.text: Thola amaqembu ongase ungawabhekile ngokusekelwe ekuhambisaneni kwenqubomgomo yangempela, hhayi nje ukuthandwa.

benefit3.title: Bona Konke Okufanayo Kwakho
benefit3.text: Thola uhlu oluhlelwe lwawo wonke amaqembu enamaphuzu okufanana, ukuze ubone izinketho zakho eziphezulu nezinye izindlela.

benefit4.title: Vota Ngokuzethemba
benefit4.text: Yenza isinqumo esinolwazi esisekelwe edatheni, hhayi ekuqageleni. Izindinganiso zakho zifaniswe nezikhundla zamaqembu.

about.title: Mayelana ne-Elekti
about.methodologyText: I-Elekti isebenzisa indlela ebanzi, esekelwe ebufakazini yokufanisa imibono yakho yezepolitiki namaqembu aseyipolitiki aseNingizimu Afrika. Uhlelo lwethu lwenzelwe ukuba nolungile, lusobala, futhi lungahlanganyeli kwezepolitiki.
about.howItWorksText: Uphendula imibuzo engu-40 eyakhiwe ngokucophelela emboza izindawo ezinkulu zenqubomgomo kufaka phakathi ukunakekelwa kwempilo, imfundo, umnotho, ukuphatha, nezindaba zomphakathi. Umbuzo ngamunye wenzelwe ukuveza okokhetha kwakho kwezepolitiki ngaphandle kokuchema kwaqembu.
about.scoringText: Impendulo ngayinye oyinikayo ifaniswa nezikhundla zamaqembu ezibhaliwe ezivela emibhalweni yesemthethweni yamaqembu, emibhalweni yenqubomgomo, nezitatimende zomphakathi. Amaqembu athola amaphuzu alinganisiwe ngokuya ngokuhambisana kwezikhundla zawo ezikhulunywayo nezimpendulo zakho. Sisebenzisa i-algorithm yokulinganisa iqembu ngalinye, okusho ukuthi iqembu ngalinye lilinganiswa ngokufana kwalo okungcono kakhulu kwemibuzo oyiphendulile. Lokhu kuqinisekisa ukuphathwa ngokulinganayo kwamaqembu amaphakathi nalawo aqinile. La maphuzu alinganiswa esikalini esingu-0-100, nentando yakho ephezulu nezinye indlela kuchazwe kahle. Sikupha futhi isilinganiso sokwethemba ukusiza ukuqonda ukuthi ukufana kwakho kuqinile kangakanani.
about.transparencyText: Zonke izikhundla zamaqembu nezisisindo samaphuzu zinqunywa ngocwaningo oluqinile lwemibhalo esemthethweni yamaqembu. Indlela yethu ivulelekile futhi ingabuyekezwa. Asikhethi noma yiliphi iqembu lezepolitiki noma isistimu yemibono - inhloso yethu kuphela ukusiza wenze izinqumo ezinolwazi ezisekelwe emibalweni yakho nezikhundla ezimenywe wamaqembu.
about.dataSourcesText: Izikhundla zamaqembu zicutshungulwa ngokucophelela emibhalweni esemthethweni yamaqembu, emibhalweni yenqubomgomo, amarekhodi okuvota eparlamende, nezitatimende zomphakathi eziqinisekisiwe. Sibuyekeza idatha yethu njalo ukubonisa izinguquko zenqubomgomo. Zonke izinto zemithombo zivela kumashaneli asemthethweni wamaqembu noma izinhlangano zezindaba ezihloniphekile. Uma ukholelwa ukuthi noma iluphi olwazi alunembile, samukela izilungiso ngemibhalo efanele.
about.privacyText: Ubumfihlo bakho bubaluleke kakhulu. Sikholelwa ukuthi imibono yakho yezepolitiki ingokwakho kakhulu futhi ifanelwe izinga eliphezulu lokuvikelwa.
about.noTrackingText: Asisebenzisi amakhukhi, ama-analytics pixels, noma noma yimuphi ubuchwepheshe bokulandelela. Asikwazi ukubona izimpendulo zakho, asikwazi ukukubona, futhi asinayo intshisekelo yokwenza njalo. Izimpendulo zakho zemibuzo azithunyelwa kumaseva ethu.
about.localOnlyText: Konke kwenzeka kusiphequluli sakho. Izimpendulo zakho zigcinwe kuphela kudivaysi yakho futhi kungekho kwenye indawo. Uma usula idatha yesiphequluli sakho, imiphumela yakho iyalahleka unomphelo - asinayo isibuyekezo ngoba asisikaze sibe nazo ekuqaleni.
about.sharingText: Uma ushayela imiphumela, izimpendulo zakho zifakwa ngqo kwithu le-URL ngokwalo. Lokhu kusho ukuthi noma ubani onalelo link angabona imiphumela yakho, kodwa idatha ayithinti amaseva ethu. Ulawula ukuthi ubani obona imiphumela yakho ngokubeka ubani othola leyo link. Sula i-link, futhi imiphumela yakho ingokwakho futhi.
about.analyticsText: Sisebenzisa i-Cloudflare Web Analytics, isevisi yama-analytics ebeka ubumfihlo kuqala engasebenzisi amakhukhi, engalandeli abantu ngabanye kumawebhusayithi, futhi engaqoqi noma iluphi ulwazi lomuntu oluhlonzekayo. Isinikeza izibalo eziyisisekelo ezihlanganisiwe (njengokubuka ikhasi eliphelele) ukusisiza siqonde ukuthi iwebhusayithi iyasetshenziswa yini, ngaphandle kokubeka ubumfihlo bakho engozini. I-Cloudflare ayikwazi ukubona izimpendulo zakho zemibuzo noma ukukubona wena mathupha.
about.partiesText: Sihlanganisa amaqembu amakhulu ayi-14 aseyipolitiki aseNingizimu Afrika amele imibono ehlukene kulo lonke uhla lwezepolitiki. Ukukhetha kwethu kusekelwe ekumelweni kweparlamende, ukubaluleka kokhetho, nokuhlukahluka kwemibono.
about.disclaimerText: I-Elekti iyithuluzi lemfundo, akusiyo indawo yocwaningo. Amaqembu ezepolitiki ayizinhlangano eziyinkimbinkimbi ezinemibono ethintana kakhulu eguquka ngokuhamba kwesikhathi. Sikukhuthaza kakhulu ukuthi ufunde imibhalo yamaqembu, uhambe emihlanganweni yomphakathi, futhi uqinisekise ulwazi lwethu ngokuzimele. Leli thuluzi likhombisa ukuvumelana okusekelwe ezikhundleni ezikhulunywayo - ukuphatha kwangempela kungahluka. Sebenzisa le miphumela njengokukuqala kokuhlola okujulile, hhayi njengesinqumo sakho sokugcina.
about.viewDataText: Ngomoya wokucaca ngokugcwele, ungahlola amafayela edatha yethu ngokwakho. La mafayela e-JSON aqukethe zonke izikhundla zamaqembu, isisindo samaphuzu, nemetadata yemibuzo esetshenziswa yi-algorithm yethu.

anc.desc: I-African National Congress iyiqembu elibusayo eNingizimu Afrika, elikhuthaza intando yeningi yomphakathi, uguquko, kanye nokubhekana nokungalingani ngokusebenzisa ukungenelela kukahulumeni.

da.desc: I-Democratic Alliance ikhuthaza intando yeningi yenkululeko, ezomnotho zemakethe yamahhala, kanye nezepolitiki ezingenalo ubuhlanga ngokugcizelela ukubusa okuhle nokudala imisebenzi.

mk.desc: I-uMkhonto we Sizwe Party igxile ekuguquleni kwezomnotho ngokuqinile, ikhuthaza ukuthuthukiswa okuholwa uhulumeni kanye nokubhekana nokungalungi komlando.

eff.desc: I-Economic Freedom Fighters iyiqembu elikwesokunxele kakhulu elikhuthaza uguquko lwezomnotho oluqinile, ukwenza kwezwe kanye nokwabiwana komhlaba ngaphandle kwenhlawulo.

ifp.desc: I-Inkatha Freedom Party ikhuthaza amasiko amaZulu, i-federalism, kanye nezomnotho zemakethe yamahhala ezinemibandela yomphakathi.

pa.desc: I-Patriotic Alliance igxile ekubhekaneni nezindaba zokufuduka, ikhuthaza ubuntu bezwe laseNingizimu Afrika, kanye nokubeka phambili izidingo zezakhamuzi.

vfplus.desc: I-Freedom Front Plus imele izintshisekelo zama-Afrikaner, ikhuthaza i-federalism, amalungelo encinyane, kanye nezindinganiso zokugcina.

actionsa.desc: I-ActionSA iyiqembu elisemaphakathi eligxile ekubuseni okungokoqobo, ekulweni nenkohlakalo, kanye nokukhula kwezomnotho ngokubambisana nomkhakha wangasese.

acdp.desc: I-African Christian Democratic Party ikhuthaza izindinganiso zobuKristu, izinqubomgomo zomphakathi ezigcinayo, kanye nentando yeningi yomthethosisekelo.

ufc.desc: I-Unite for Change igxile ekuhlanganiseni abantu ngaphansi kanye nokubhekana nezinkinga zemiphakathi yendawo ngezinqubomgomo eziqhubekayo.

sacp.desc: I-South African Communist Party ikhuthaza ubuntu, amalungelo abasebenzi, kanye nokuguqukela emphakathini wobuntu ngokuphatha kukahulumeni.

udm.desc: I-United Democratic Movement ikhuthaza intando yeningi yomphakathi, ukubuyisana, kanye nezinqubomgomo ezingokoqobo zokuqeda ubumpofu nokungalingani.

aljamah.desc: I-Al Jama-ah imele izindinganiso zobuIslam futhi imele ubulungiswa bomphakathi, ukubusa okunokuziphatha, namalungelo emiphakathi ecindezelwe.

cope.desc: I-Congress of the People ikhuthaza intando yeningi yomphakathi, ukubusa okuhle, kanye nezinqubomgomo zezomnotho ezilinganisa ukukhula nenhlalakahle yomphakathi.

q1.text: Uhulumeni kufanele akhuphule izintela kubantu abanothileyo ukuxhasa izinhlelo zomphakathi ezingeziwe (ezempilo, imfundo nezibonelelo zomphakathi).

q2.text: Uhulumeni kufanele abeke phambili ukukhokhwa kwezikweletu zomphakathi kanye nokuqinisekisa ukusimama kwezimali ngisho noma lokhu kukhawulela ukusetshenziswa kwemali entsha yezenhlalo.

q3.text: Uhulumeni kufanele asekele ngenkuthalo amabhizinisi amancane naphakathi ngezaphulelo zentela kanye nokunciphisa imithetho ukuze kukhuthazwe ukukhula.

q4.text: Uhulumeni kufanele asebenzise isibonelelo semali esingagunyaziwe kubo bonke izakhamuzi, ngisho noma kudinga izintela eziphezulu noma ukuboleka.

q5.text: Uhulumeni kufanele adale izinhlelo ezinkulu zemisebenzi yomphakathi kanye nezinhlelo zokuqinisekisa umsebenzi ukunciphisa ukungaqashwa.

q6.text: Uhlelo lokunakekelwa kwempilo oluxhaswa ngumphakathi (uhlelo lwe-National Health Insurance) kufanele lusungulwe ukunikeza ukunakekelwa kwamahhala kubo bonke.

q7.text: Imfundo ephakeme kufanele ibe mahhala kubo bonke abafundi (ayikho imali), hhayi nje usizo lwezimali oluhlolwayo.

q8.text: Umbuso kufanele unikeze uxhaso oluqinile lokunakekelwa kwezingane ukuze kusekelwe abazali abasebenzayo.

q9.text: Izinsizakalo zohulumeni basekhaya kufanele ziqashwe ngabasebenzi abaqeqeshiwe futhi zihlolwe njalo ukuze kuncishiswe inkohlakalo nokuhluleka kwezinsizakalo.

q10.text: Uhulumeni kufanele agcine izinsizakalo eziyisisekelo zomphakathi (ugesi, amanzi, izitimela) kubunikazi bomphakathi kunokuzithengisa ezinkampanini ezizimele.

q11.text: Ukuthathwa komhlaba wangasese ngaphandle kokukhokhelwa kwenani lemakethe kufanele kuvunyelwe ngaphansi komthetho ukusheshisa ukuguqulwa komhlaba.

q12.text: Ukuthuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemakhaya nokusekela ezolimo (okuhlanganisa izibonelelo nezingqalasizinda zabalimi abancane) kufanele kuthole uxhaso olukhulu luka hulumeni.

q13.text: Abasebenzi kufanele babe namalungelo aqinile okushayela nokuxoxisana ngqo nabaqashi ngaphandle kokungenelela kukahulumeni.

q14.text: Amaholo amancane kufanele akhuphulwe kakhulu ukuze kuncishiswe ubumpofu kubantu abasebenzayo, noma ngabe amabhizinisi amancane ethola ubunzima.

q15.text: Ukuguquguquka kwemakethe yezabasebenzi (ukuqasha nokuxosha kalula) kuzokwandisa utshalomali futhi kufanele kukhuthazwe.

q16.text: Amaphoyisa kufanele anikezwe amandla nezinsiza eziqinile zokulwa nobugebengu obunodlame, noma ngabe lokho kwandisa igunya lombuso.

q17.text: Ukuzimela kwezinkantolo kanye nezikhathi zokushushisa kufanele kuvikelwe ngokuqinile, ngisho noma lokho kunciphisa ukuguquguquka kwesigqila.

q18.text: Isenzo esinamandla esilwa nenkohlakalo (ngisho noma kuphazamisa abaholi bamanje) kubaluleke kunokugcina ukuzinza kwezepolitiki.

q19.text: Inkululeko yomphakathi njengenkululeko yokukhuluma nokubhikisha ngokuthula kufanele ibekwe phambili noma ngabe yenza umsebenzi wamaphoyisa ube nzima.

q20.text: Uhulumeni kufanele aqinise ukuvikelwa komthetho kwabantu be-LGBTQ+ futhi athuthukise amalungelo alinganayo asakhamuzi.

q21.text: Inkululeko yabezindaba nokuvikelwa kwezintatheli kufanele kuqiniswe, noma ngabe ukubika okugxekayo kubhekiswe kuhulumeni.

q22.text: INingizimu Afrika kufanele ibeke imigomo kazwelonke ebophayo ngokusemthethweni yokunciphisa ukukhishwa kwesisi esingcolisa umoya futhi iqede ukusetshenziswa kwamalahle ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.

q23.text: Izwe kufanele libeke phambili ukutshalwa kwezimali emandleni avuselelekayo (ilanga, umoya) kunokwandisa amandla amalahle.

q24.text: Imithetho yokuvikela imvelo kufanele ibekwe phambili kunokuthuthukiswa okusha kwezimbiwa namalahle.

q25.text: INingizimu Afrika kufanele ibeke phambili ukukhula okuholwa ukuthunyelwa kwempahla kwamanye amazwe ngokwakha ubudlelwano obuqinile bezohwebo nezimakethe zamazwe ngamazwe.

q26.text: INingizimu Afrika kufanele ibeke phambili ukwakha ubudlelwano obuqinile namanye amazwe ase-Global South kunokuzihlanganisa ngokukhethekile namazwe aseNtshonalanga.

q27.text: INingizimu Afrika kufanele ibeke phambili izivumelwano zohwebo ezivikela izimboni zasekhaya, ngisho noma kusho amanani aphezulu kubathengi.

q28.text: Utshalomali lomphakathi kufanele lubeke phambili ezokuthutha zomphakathi ezinkulu (izitimela namabhasi asheshayo) kunemigwaqo emikhulu emisha.

q29.text: Uhulumeni kufanele atshale kakhulu ezindlini zomphakathi zemindeni engenayo imali eningi.

q30.text: Ukuhlelwa kwamadolobha kufanele kubeke phambili izindawo zomphakathi eziluhlaza, ukuhamba ngezinyawo, kanye nokuthuthukiswa okuxubile kunokwanda kwamadolobha okugxile ezimotweni.

q31.text: INingizimu Afrika kufanele yamukele imithetho eqinile yobumfihlo yedijithali enciphisa ukugadwa yizinkampani kanye nombuso.

q32.text: Uhulumeni kufanele alawule ubuhlakani bokwenziwa (AI) ukuze kuvikelwe imisebenzi futhi kuvinjelwe izinqumo ezizenzakalelayo ezinobandlululo.

q33.text: Uxhaso lwesayensi nocwaningo kufanele lukhuliswe kakhulu ukuze kuqhutshekiswe ukusungula izinto ezintsha nokukhula kwesikhathi eside.

q34.text: Ukuphepha kokudla kufanele kuzuzwe ngesu likazwelonke elisekela ukukhiqizwa kwendawo, ezolimo zemvelo, kanye nezingadi zomphakathi.

q35.text: Imithetho yenhlalakahle yezilwane kufanele iqiniswe, kuhlanganise nokuvimbela izindlela zokufuya ezimbonini ezinkulu.

q36.text: Ukungaqashwa kwentsha kudinga insizakalo yentsha kazwelonke ezinikele kanye nezinhlelo zokufundisa umsebenzi eziqinisekisiwe.

q37.text: Izinyathelo ezikhethekile ziyadingeka ukuthuthukisa ukufinyelela nezinsizakalo zabantu abakhubazekile kuyo yonke iminyango kahulumeni.

q38.text: Uhulumeni kufanele ungenise izibonelelo eziqondiswe ngqo kanye nokukhuthazwa ukusheshisa ezomnotho zasemadolobheni nasemakhaya.

q39.text: Inqubomgomo yamasiko kufanele isekele ukuhlukahluka kwezilimi nobuciko baseNingizimu Afrika ngokuxhaswa ngezimali zikahulumeni ezizinzile.

q40.text: Abavoti kufanele balinganise irekhodi leqembu lokunikezwa kwezinsizakalo nenkohlakalo ngokujulile kunezaga zalo zembono yezombusazwe.
